actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Alani Lipine to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in coastwise trade.

summary.text: Provides for the documentation of a named vessel as a vessel of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Alani Lipine to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in coastwise trade.
